name: Koa The Forgotten Gods 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

A third person combat action-adventure game where a koa warrior finds herself pursuing revenge against the goddess of Volcanoes,Tūtū Pele, after a tragedy strikes her village.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unity
Number of players: 1

3C & AI Designer - Scripter : Julien DUPUIS
Tech Level & Game Designer - Tech Lighting & Art : Christophe DORIDOT
Level / Environment & Narrative Design : Dimar NÉHMÉ
Game / Level / Narrative / Cut-scene & Environment Design : Yzza SAFIEDDINE 

Prop & Weapon Artist : Antonin MORIELLI
Rigger - Animateur : Chris DAVID
Environment & Tech Artist : Hugo PAUPER
